root.name: Hercules
root.description: OverviewHercules is a pinball machine developed and manufactured by Atari.The table is 93 inches long by 39 inches wide, making it the largest pinball table known.GameplayOther than it's unique size, the actual game is fairly basic pinball with 2 flippers, 2 automated bumpers and 1 spinning target. Playing a game this size, however, feels quite a bit different than playing a standard table.
